device_mount: Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Handheld
contribution_desc:
"This paper presents how ad-hoc co-located collaborations can be supported with an arbitrary number of users that only have access to small-size mobile displays. Our approach is based on tracking of these personal displays that share the same information space."

in particular: introduce "portable personal displays (PPDs)", and peep-hole views into information spaces
tracking_characteristic: Outside-in tracking; Location 2D; Orientation; Tracking devices only
tracking_tech: Acoustic signals; V-scope system developed by Lipmann Electronic engineering
